component.name: TV-Lite
component.summary: TV-Lite is a IPTV player, with Sopcast and Acestream handling capabilities.

description.p: TV-Lite wants to be a replacement for the older TV-Maxe. It does not have all the features that TV-Maxe offers. It uses the same principle of "subscriptions" and uses the same playlist format TV-Maxe uses. Apart from that, it can handle the ubiquitous M3U format used for many IPTV playlists. It aims to streamline a bit the behavior of TV-Maxe in respect to subscriptions. The subscriptions can be downloaded and saved as local playlists, that can be edited and new channels can be added, or the existent channels can be edited.
